title: CLARY SAGE: Overview, Uses, Side Effects, Precautions, Interactions, Dosing and Reviews
description: Learn more about CLARY SAGE uses, effectiveness, possible side effects, interactions, dosage, user ratings and products that contain CLARY SAGE.
cleaned_text: Overview Clary sage is used for [upset [menstrual cramps](https://www.webmd.com/women/menstrual-cramps)(dysmenorrhea), [symptoms of menopause](https://www.webmd.com/menopause/understanding-menopause-symptoms), anxiety, stress, and many other conditions, but there is no good scientific evidence to support these uses. In foods and beverages, the oil from clary sage is used as a flavoring agent. In manufacturing, the oil from clary sage is used as a fragrance in soaps and [cosmetics](https://www.webmd.com/beauty/rm-quiz-makeup). Uses & Effectiveness Insufficient Evidence for - Nausea and vomiting after surgery. Early research shows that inhaling clary sage as [aromatherapy](https://www.webmd.com/balance/video/aromatherapy-benefits)after surgery does not prevent nausea or vomiting. - Pain after surgery. Early research shows that inhaling clary sage as aromatherapy after surgery does not reduce pain. - Anxiety. [Depression](https://www.webmd.com/depression/understanding-depression-basics). - Digestive disorders. [Indigestion](https://www.webmd.com/heartburn-gerd/indigestion-overview)( [dyspepsia](https://www.webmd.com/heartburn-gerd/indigestion)). - Kidney diseases. [Menstrual cramps](https://www.webmd.com/women/ss/slideshow-get-rid-of-cramps)(dysmenorrhea). - Stress. - Symptoms of menopause. - Other conditions. Side Effects [mouth](https://www.webmd.com/oral-health/ss/slideshow-mouth-problems): Clary sage is LIKELY SAFE when used in amounts found in foods. There isn't enough reliable information to know if clary sage is safe when used in medicinal amounts or what the side effects might be. When applied to the [skin](https://www.webmd.com/skin-problems-and-treatments/picture-of-the-skin): There isn't enough reliable information to know if clary sage is safe or what the side effects might be. When inhaled (as aromatherapy): There isn't enough reliable information to know if clary sage is safe or what the side effects might be. Special Precautions and Warnings [breast](https://www.webmd.com/women/picture-of-the-breasts)-feeding: There isn't enough reliable information to know if clary sage is safe to use when pregnant or breast-feeding. Stay on the safe side and stick to food amounts. Interactions We currently have no information for CLARY SAGE Interactions.
